mapper.insert: insert into yh_platform_updprice( PH_KEY,SHEETID,REFSHEETID,REFSHEETTYPE,SHEETCANCELFLAG, SHOPID,CHANGEMODE,STARTDATE,ENDDATE,NMPRICEFLAG, CHECKDATE,EXECUTETIME,NOTE,ORDERFLAG,STARTTIME, ENDTIME,DMSHEETID,ISEMPTY,AREAID,UPDTYPE, PLANID,PROMNO,POPLEVEL,RULENO,FDMODE, SDFLAG,CUSTTYPE,PRI,SYNCHRO) values( #{phKey},#{sheetId},#{refSheetId},#{refSheetType},#{sheetCancelFlag}, #{shopId},#{changeMode},#{startDate},#{endDate},#{nmPriceFlag}, #{checkDate},#{executeTime},#{note},#{orderFlag},#{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{dmSheetId},#{isEmpty},#{areaId}, #{updType}, #{planId},#{promNo},#{popLevel},#{ruleNo},#{fdMode}, #{sdFlag},#{custType},#{pri},#{synchro} )
